contact.name: Contact Form
contact.title: Contact Form
contact.caption:
**WIN an all-expenses paid trip to a 2021 HSBC World Rugby Sevens Series tournament of your choice, courtesy of HSBC.**

**Prize includes:**
Two VIP tickets to any tournament of your choice
Two return flights to the tournament
Accommodation and more!

To be entered for a chance to win, please provide your details to HSBC by filling out the below form.

questions.name: select_the_2021_sevens_tournament_of_your_choice
questions.label: Select the 2021 Sevens tournament of your choice

questions.name: are_you_an_hsbc_current_account_customer
questions.label: Are you an HSBC current account customer?

options.name: terms_and_conditions
options.label: I confirm I am the age wof majority or older in my province/territory of residence and have read and agree to the contest [terms & conditions](/terms 'terms & conditions') and HSBC's Privacy Policy*

options.name: hsbc_offers
options.label: I consent to receive exclusive rugby content and promotional offers from HSBC and CSM Sport & Entertainment on behalf of HSBC via email. I understand that I can unsubscribe at any time.

options.name: world_rugby_offers
options.label: Separately to this contest, I would like to receive information and special offers from World Rugby relating to rugby and rugby tournaments by email.

questions.name: smartTV_own
questions.label: Do you own a smart TV? [Single choice]

question.name: tv_smart_brand
question.label: What brand is your smart TV? [Single choice]

question.name: tv_smart_price
question.label: What is the price of your TV? [Single choice]

question.name: tv_smart_buy
question.label: When did you buy your smart TV? [Single choice]

question.name: what_care_buying_tv
question.label: What features did you look for when buying your TV? [Multiple choice - please select no more than 5]

options.label: Ease of use (operation system, remote control, etc.)
Smart home function(TV links with IoT devices and sensors so you can turn on the lights, check fridge, run the robot etc. )

question.name: tv_smart_use
question.label: How do you use your TV usually? [Multiple choice - please select no more than 3]

options.label: Casting/mirroring your mobile device screen to TV
Watch live TV from satellite /cable/Antenna built-in tuner
Watch live TV from Set-top box
Watch apps (Netflix etc.) built in TV
Watch apps from streaming box ( Apple TV, Google Chrome etc)
Play video/photo from Storage device (USB/Hard disc)

question.name: tv_smart_sport
question.label: How do you watch sports programs on TV? [Multiple choice - please select no more than 3]

options.label: Watch live TV from a Set-top box
Cast or Mirror mobile device screen to TV

question.name: tv_smart_picture_quality
question.label: What are the most important factors about the Picture quality? [Multiple choice - please select no more than 5]

options.label: Reduce / avoid eye fatigue while watching
The black scene has clear details
Picture algorithms to improve the picture
AI picture modes (adjusts color, brightness and contrast scene by scene)

question.name: tv_smart_sound_quality
question.label: What are the most important factors about the Sound quality? [Multiple choice - please select no more than 5]

options.label: Different sound modes to adapt to different content (like sports, music, theatre)
TV speaker output way (speaker output direction, forward, backward, up, down)
Cooperate with professional acoustic brands such as Harman Kardon

question.name: tv_smart_apps
question.label: What apps do you use often? [Multiple choice - please select no more than 5]

Metal body(More durable and more textured)
